Series module¶

Sloth.Series.astype()¶
Sloth.Series.fast_init()¶

Backdoor of sorts. Allows for a quicker initialization after slicing.

Parameters:
maskslice

slice to be used

Sloth.Series.iterrows()¶
Sloth.Series.plot()¶

Plotting function. Requires matplotlib and Pandas to be installed. All paramters are passed onto pandas.

Sloth.Series.resample()¶
Sloth.Series.rolling()¶
Sloth.Series.to_numpy()¶
Sloth.Series.to_pandas()¶
